thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 9 of 539
thread.title: Allison

author: Allison
title: Allison
text: Great pictures on sight, super quick shipping. Just wish the description gave more information about the dress, like the inside support, lining, mesh areas. My dresses back is completely mesh which I didn't realize, you couldnt tell it was that way from the picture. I assumed I wouldn't be wearing a bra with this dress anyway so I don't mind but it would have been nice to know prior to purchase. I was also a little worried about the inside bra support of the dress it didn't specify if the dress had any, which it really doesn't. I love the dress though just wish the description about the dress was better. Overall it's a great product
